description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: An open redirect in the Login/Logout functionality of web management in AVSystem Unified Management Platform (UMP) 23.07.0.16567~LTS could allow attackers to redirect authenticated users to malicious websites.

Una redirección abierta en la funcionalidad de inicio de sesión/cierre de sesión de la administración web en AVSystem Unified Management Platform (UMP) 23.07.0.16567~LTS podría permitir a atacantes redirigir a usuarios autenticados a sitios web maliciosos.
